trans-unit.source: Implements low-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Operações de personalização de baixo nível implementa.

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe implementa a lógica necessária para executar operações de personalização de nível inferior.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the WebPartPersonalization class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe gere o ciclo de vida de alto nível de personalização, é a classe de WebPartPersonalization que é responsável por implementar, na verdade, os passos físicos necessários para realizar ações de personalização específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartPersonalization class in turn relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartPersonalization por sua vez depende de uma implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>para comunicar com o arquivo de dados subjacente para obter informações de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, it creates an instance of the WebPartPersonalization class that you can use by referencing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar a implementação predefinida do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, cria uma instância da classe WebPartPersonalization que pode utilizar ao consultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para acesso a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade, tem de especificar `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on whose behalf the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance will carry out personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma instância desta classe e associa-a com a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo em cujo nome o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância irá realizar operações de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> used to manage the personalization information
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> utilizado para gerir as informações de personalização

trans-unit.source: owner is .
trans-unit.target: owneris .

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se os dados de personalização a principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para aplicar o estado de personalização para o controlo de peças Web fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se os dados de personalização a especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar quando solicitado a fazê-lo pelo principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derived class when requested to do so by the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado para aplicar dados de personalização até um indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-classe quando solicitado a fazê-lo pelo principal derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para aplicar o estado de personalização para o controlo de peças Web fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: As peças Web do controlo para que personalização dados estão a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para aplicar o estado de personalização a um controlo de peças Web que não seja gerido pela principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o utilizador está autorizado para introduzir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve `true` se o utilizador está autorizado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>introduzir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>âmbito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope and caches the information.
trans-unit.target: A primeira denomina-se a propriedade, determina do direito introduzir o utilizador <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>Analisar e coloca em cache as informações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dicionário é modificado após a primeira vez que esta propriedade é chamada, as alterações não são mostradas em chamadas subsequentes para esta propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador está autorizado para introduzir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance to the scope specified.
trans-unit.target: Altera a página atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância para o âmbito especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método altera o âmbito de personalização da página atualmente em execução para o novo âmbito especificado pelo `newScope` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é o método de programa auxiliar protegido que é chamado pelo público <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between.
trans-unit.target: Este método protegido existe para processar extensibilidade futura, se existir mais do que dois âmbitos possíveis alternar entre.

trans-unit.source: If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o âmbito atual e `newScope` são o mesmo valor, em seguida, este método não efetua nenhuma operação.

trans-unit.source: The new personalization scope for the current page.
trans-unit.target: O novo âmbito de personalização de página atual.

trans-unit.source: If attempting to switch from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar mudar da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito, o utilizador atual não tem a capacidade de utilizador para introduzir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito.

trans-unit.source: scope is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: scopeNão é um membro válido do enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai o estado de personalização de um controlo de peças Web e aplica-la a um segundo controlo de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Este método extrai o estado de personalização do `webPartA` e aplica-se de que `webPartB`.

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: Este método assume que `webPartA` e `webPartB` são o mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: If the Web Parts controls are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Se os controlos de peças Web são <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controlos, o método copia o estado de personalização do controlo subordinado moldado numa `webPartA` para o controlo subordinado moldado numa `webPartB`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Como parte da operação de cópia, `webPartB` está marcado como "desatualização".

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de peças Web fornecendo os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de peças Web a receber os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: Either webPartA or webPartB is .
trans-unit.target: Either webPartA or webPartB is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a personalização for pedida esteja ativado para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade indica se a personalização for pedida estar ativado para o elemento principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que se trata de uma distinção importante mas subtis do objetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that the Enabled property must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element if personalization should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Na prática, isto significa que a propriedade Enabled tem de ser definida na marcação de página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento se personalização deve ser desativada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, esta propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para definir o valor desta propriedade após associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método sido concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância concluída inicialização ou que o utilizador atual tem direitos para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica o tipo de verificação deve ser efetuado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> instância de autorização de um utilizador introduzir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> âmbito.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: O direito de utilizador é representado pela cadeia de caracteres "enterSharedScope" no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai os dados de personalização do principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, e o estado de personalização não está a ser reposto durante o pedido de página (como quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>propriedade é `false`), em seguida, este método extrai dados de personalização do principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar durante o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância, a extrair o estado de personalização do principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai os dados de personalização de um controlo de peças Web quando solicitado a fazê-lo pelo principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, e o estado de personalização não está a ser reposto durante o pedido de página (como quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>propriedade é `false`), em seguida, este método extrai dados de personalização do controlo de peças Web especificado pelo `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>método no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância, a extrair o estado de personalização do controlo de peças Web fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: As peças Web do controlo que contém os dados de personalização a ser extraído.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para extrair o estado de personalização de um controlo de peças Web que não é gerido pelo principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o filtro de autorização, se aplicável, associados com o controlo de peças Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`.
trans-unit.target: Este método obtém o filtro de autorização, se aplicável, associado ao controlo de peças Web identificado por `webPartID`.

trans-unit.source: Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo de peças Web é serializado e gerido pelo personalização está associado um `webPartID` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: At run time, a page's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: AT tempo de execução, uma página do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo pode filtrar os controlos apresentados numa página através da determinação de se cada controlo de peças Web está autorizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações de autorização são armazenadas como uma cadeia com os dados associados a cada controlo de peças Web.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O ID do controlo de peças Web associado com o filtro a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: O filtro de autorização para o controlo de peças Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: webPartID is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: webPartIDé ou uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current page and personalization scope have associated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a página atual e o âmbito de personalização associou os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método prático para determinar se a combinação de página e o âmbito atual tem os dados de personalização associados à mesma.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> on the provider to determine whether data exists.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, as chamadas de método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>no fornecedor para determinar a existem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page has personalization data associated with it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a página tem os dados de personalização associados à mesma; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o âmbito de personalização de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o âmbito de personalização de predefinido deve ser utilizado para o elemento principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo na ausência de anterior conhecimentos sobre o âmbito adequado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade não for explicitamente definida, assume como devolver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>âmbito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means InitialScope must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Na prática, isto significa que InitialScope tem de ser definido na marcação de página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, esta propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the default personalization scope of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> que indica o âmbito de personalização de predefinida da associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para definir esta propriedade para um valor diferente do respetivo valor atual depois de associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método sido concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a value of InitialScope that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para definir um valor de InitialScope que não seja um membro a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a personalização está ativada e foi carregado com êxito os dados de personalização para esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de carregar os dados de personalização, esta propriedade devolverá sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, esta propriedade irá devolver `false` durante o `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: After the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called), this property will then return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método foi concluída com êxito (durante o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método é denominado), esta propriedade, em seguida, irá devolver `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é um alias acessível publicamente para protegida <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização está ativada para o atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> dados de instância e a personalização tem com êxito carregado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a personalização está ativada e foi carregado com êxito os dados de personalização para esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If the personalization feature is enabled (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called).
trans-unit.target: Se estiver ativada a funcionalidade de personalização (se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`), o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância é considerada inicializado imediatamente após associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método foi concluída com êxito (durante o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método é denominado).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de carregar os dados de personalização, esta propriedade devolve sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização foi inicializada para esta instância; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o utilizador atual está autorizado a modificar informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira vez que esta propriedade é chamada, coloca em cache o resultado de determinar o direito de utilizador para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dicionário é modificado após a primeira vez que esta propriedade é chamada, as alterações não são serão refletidas na chamadas subsequentes para esta propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador está autorizado a modificar informações de estado caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes personalization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a personalização.

trans-unit.source: This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este é o ponto de entrada principal para inicializar as informações de personalização em nome do principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, this method will never be called.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, se tiver sido desativada personalização no principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo, nunca será possível chamar este método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> page markup or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property, is obtained.
trans-unit.target: No decorrer deste método, as inicializações seguintes ocorrem: - A referência para qualquer fornecedor de personalização predefinido ou o fornecedor personalizado indicado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>marcação de página ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>propriedade, são obtidas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: - The provider is called to determine the user capabilities (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: -O fornecedor é chamado para determinar as capacidades de utilizador (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) para o utilizador atualmente em execução.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) and stored within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: -O estado de personalização a combinação de página / / âmbito do utilizador atual é carregado do arquivo de dados subjacente pelo fornecedor (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) e armazenadas dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -O âmbito de personalização de página / / âmbito do utilizador atual é determinado pelo fornecedor (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o resultado desta determinação poderá ser diferente do valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do âmbito devolvido por este método é utilizado como o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the Load method is called directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>irá ocorrer excepção devido a personalização não ativada apenas se o método de carregamento é chamado directamente.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: Numa implementação ASP.NET, um método de ajuda interno, na verdade, é chamado para efetuar o carregamento e este método de programa auxiliar devolve automaticamente se não foi ativada para a página de personalização.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância para o elemento principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Os fornecedores de personalização subjacente não conseguiu iniciar, porque não foi possível encontrar um fornecedor predefinido ou porque ocorreu uma falha ao tentar inicializar um fornecedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> instância de autorização de um utilizador para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "modifyState" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: O direito de utilizador é representado pela cadeia de caracteres "modifyState" no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do fornecedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor definido para esta propriedade na declaração de página.

trans-unit.source: If this property was not set, it returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade não foi definida, devolve <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, a página utiliza o fornecedor de personalização predefinido, especificado no ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This means the ProviderName property must be set in the page declaration on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que a propriedade ProviderName tem de ser definida na declaração de página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, esta propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: O nome do fornecedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para definir esta propriedade para um valor diferente do respetivo valor atual depois do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método foi concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Repõe os dados de personalização para a página atual, o âmbito e o utilizador no arquivo de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Este método repõe os dados de personalização para a página atual, o âmbito e o utilizador no arquivo de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Como efeito colateral da reposição, a página atualmente em execução novamente executada por um <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>chamar.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que esta transferência executa novamente a página atual como um `GET` pedido, independentemente da forma como a página foram originalmente pedida.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser chamado em qualquer altura.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the ResetPersonalizationState method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama o método de ResetPersonalizationState no fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: After data is successfully reset, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de dados são repostos com êxito, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is used elsewhere by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada noutro local o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância para ignorar a extrair dados de personalização a partir das propriedades de controlo e guardá-lo se já tem sido redefinidos dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância não pode referenciar um fornecedor de personalização válido.

trans-unit.source: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Guarda os dados de personalização para a página atual, o âmbito e o utilizador para o arquivo de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, as chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>método no fornecedor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de guardar os dados de personalização quando o utilizador atualmente em execução não tem a capacidade de chamado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>(dentro atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância) resulta num <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected Save method directly.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que apenas é verdadeiro se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo chamado protegida Guardar método diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do ASP.NET, um método de ajuda interno, na verdade, é chamado para efetuar a guardar e este método de programa auxiliar devolve automaticamente se o utilizador atualmente em execução não tem direitos para modificar os dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o âmbito de personalização atual do elemento principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é definido inicialmente com base no valor devolvido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode ser modificado por chamar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que representa o âmbito utilizado para aplicar e extrair informações de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade poderão ser diferentes de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance indicating the scope of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância que indica o âmbito do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo como tendo os dados de personalização que foi alterada (é "desatualização").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, este método marca principal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar como "desatualizados".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Consoante os detalhes de implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância do controlo de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, este método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo monitoriza o estado "desatualização" internamente e expõe "dirtiness" do Gestor de através do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>propriedade, em vez de através deste método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Não existem dados de personalização foi carregados.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o controlo de peças Web especificado como tendo os dados de personalização que foi alterada (é "desatualização").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, este método marca o controlo de peças Web especificado como "desatualizados".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Consoante os detalhes de implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância do controlo de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, este método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: O controlo de peças Web para ser marcados como "desatualizados".

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para marcar como "incorreto" um controlo de peças Web que não é gerido pelo principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Não existem dados de personalização foi carregados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados de personalização da página atual tem sido redefinidos (por exemplo, foi efetuado um pedido para eliminar os dados de personalização do arquivo de dados subjacente).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade estiver definida como `true`, ele indica que o estado de personalização de página atual foi reposto e que a extração de dados de personalização de controlos e subsequentes guardar operações deve ser ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, esta propriedade é automaticamente definida para `true` a infraestrutura de personalização se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que, apesar de existirem sem restrições no quando esta propriedade pode ser definida, a propriedade deve ser definida `true` antes o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento ter qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado de personalização de página atual tiver sido redefinido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> or from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Muda o âmbito de personalização da página atual da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ou a partir de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Este método activa/desactiva o âmbito de personalização da página atualmente em execução.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Ativando ou desativando o âmbito resulta num <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>regressar à página atual em execução.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Este método não efetua nenhuma operação se denomina-se a um exportar ou importar de um controlo de peças Web está a ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Se um pedido de âmbito de alternar ocorre para uma página que foi submetida através de um `POST` pedido, em seguida, quaisquer valores de cadeia de consulta serão mantidas durante a transferência; parâmetros de cadeia de consulta não são preservados se a página foi submetida através de um `GET` pedido.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para ativar/desativar a um âmbito que não está definido no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Tecnicamente, esta situação nunca deve ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de capacidades de utilizador do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> concedidas ao utilizador atual.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"></xref> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém o conjunto de capacidades de utilizador concedidas ao utilizador atual, ou vazio <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"> </xref> se o utilizador é anónimo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do principal atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo associado a este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo associado esta instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O principal atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.
